author: Scott Kelly
title: Next Gen Capital Markets, Inc. Launches Digital Finance Platform To Connect “Disruptive” Private Companies With Institutional Investors.
text:
Next Gen Capital Markets (NGCM), announced that they have launched the latest version of their digital finance platform to connect private companies to their network of institutional investors. NGCM’s platform service allows institutional investors to quickly and easily find private investment opportunities. The platform focuses on companies seeking investment capital that are pre-revenue startups through established, mature private companies. Next Gen Capital Markets platform was created to improve how the private capital markets operate. They provide a platform for private companies seeking $1 million to $150 million (“Private Companies”) to post their profile, populate a full-scale due diligence data room and undergo high level due diligence by independent valuation, legal, financial and industry experts.
Benefits to Private Companies:
 Comprehensive Company Profile - Spark the interest of firms that are ready to help you grow. Due Diligence Data Room - A rigorous, guided approach to preparing your company for funding Investment Readiness Assessment - Our network of over 4,000 industry experts will analyze your company’s current aptitude for investment success. Access to Institutional Investors - Get found. Get funding
Benefits to Institutional Investors:
 Savings - Due diligence is expensive. Our upfront work will save you time and money on your deals. Scale - The extensive selection of deals we offer means finding exactly what you’re looking for is easy. Rigor - Our complex and meticulous 200-point due diligence data room methodology means that you get incredibly comprehensive insight. Expertise - Trusted advisors from finance, valuation, legal, and industry offer the solid, specialized knowledge you need to invest with confidence. Data - Comprehensive due diligence data room and investment assessment give you the whole picture before you commit resources. Elliott Nunez, Founder, CEO of Next Gen Capital Markets added, “The latest version of our platform provides private companies an effective and efficient means to present and position their company for institutional investment. Institutional investors, will be able to save time and expense conducting due diligence and make fully informed, vetted investments. We are excited about the opportunity to connect great companies to our network of institutional investors.”
Private Companies seeking capital and investors looking for private company investment opportunities can register at http://nextgencapitalmarkets.com
About NGCM:
Headquartered in Houston, with representatives across the US, Europe, and Asia, Next Gen Capital Markets was founded by a group of investors, entrepreneurs, and international business veterans who want to use technology to power faster and more efficient success tools within the global private capital markets.
